short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that highlights component borders to facilitate the detection of misaligned elements on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension works by adding visual borders to all components on a webpage, enabling users to easily identify misaligned or improperly positioned elements. By highlighting these problematic areas, users can make adjustments more precisely in the design and layout of elements on their own webpages or while browsing the internet. Downloading this extension is an excellent way to enhance the design experience and ensure visually polished presentation online.
